title: Smart Data Models - UnderexcLimIEEE1
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents the Type UEL1 model which has a circular limit boundary when plotted in terms of machine reactive power vs. real power output.  Reference: IEEE UEL1 421.5-2005 Section 10.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be UnderexcLimIEEE1

kuc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL center setting (K).  Typical Value = 1.38. Default: 0.0

kuf.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL excitation system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 3.3. Default: 0.0

kui.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

kul.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0.0

kur.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL radius setting (K).  Typical Value = 1.95. Default: 0.0

tu1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tu2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

tu3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

tu4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

vucmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL maximum limit for operating point phasor magnitude (V).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0

vuimax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integrator output maximum limit (V). Default: 0.0

vuimin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL integrator output minimum limit (V). Default: 0.0

vulmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL output maximum limit (V).  Typical Value = 18. Default: 0.0

vulmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL output minimum limit (V).  Typical Value = -18. Default: 0.0

vurmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. UEL maximum limit for radius phasor magnitude (V).  Typical Value = 5.8. Default: 0.0
